title: Drake celebrates his son Adonis' 2nd birthday by sharing a photo of his huge balloon arrangement
text:
Drake pulled out all the stops when it came to showering his son, Adonis, on his second birthday on Friday.

The singer-rapper, 32, gave a rare glimpse into his life on social media when she shared a photo from inside his Toronto mansion, showing a bevy of gold balloons that spelled out his boy's name

'Happy Birthday King,' Drake captioned the photo that also included a Sesame Street inspired art piece.

Father's love: Drake shared his love for son Adonis by sharing a snap of his balloon arrangement inside his Toronto mansion for his 2nd birthday

The birthday decorations were adorned all around the doorway that led into the superstar's piano room.

Earlier today, Sophie Brussaux, the mother of Drake’s son, shared a throwback photo from her pregnancy that showcased her baby bump in a black fitted dress.

'Only a handful of weeks left, over 200lbs. Looks like I'm carrying twins but I swear I'm not,' she wrote across the photo at the time.

In celebration of Adonis' birthday on Friday, Brussaux wrote a new comment across the top of the throwback snap.

'Today, it's been 2 years since I was having 50 sec contractions ever 3 minutes for 24 HOURS man.... all worth it.'

The proud mother also shared a photo of herself looking adoringly into the camera as she was breastfeeding her boy as a newborn.

She stylishly had a bright light to brushed over her son's face and breast before sharing it to her 194,000 Instagram followers.

Brussaux has rarely gone public with news about her son and Drake.

The Hotline Bling singer has shared his son’s artwork on a few occasions, but has yet to share a photo of Adonis.
